name: Insect Planet (Sasha Blue Godfrey)
description:
Starting with 3D first person shooter, converted it to a math-quiz action game.

Major modifications:

1. 3 unique levels; level 2 is more challenging than level 1 and then you face the boss

2. Added quiz questions including:

- pausing enemy death

- randomly asking question from list  (on question screen)

- randomly populating 2 wrong answers

- providing feedback (on answer screen)

- killing enemy upon correctly answering the question

3. Releasing/activating elements (like keycards and portals) based on number of questions answered correctly.
